short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend the Translatium app on Mac and Windows to translate selected text with one click (desktop app required).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Translatium experience on Mac and Windows with seamless text translation. Just highlight any text, right-click, and choose "Translate with Translatium" to instantly send it to the desktop app for translation.

⚠️ Note: This extension requires the Translatium app for macOS or Windows. Download now at https://translatium.app
